org.webcurator.ui.report.command
Class ReportEmailCommand

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.ui.report.command.ReportEmailCommand

public class ReportEmailCommand
extends java.lang.Object

Command for reporting-email.jsp

Allows to reteive parameter needed for sending a report via e-mail. See also ReportEmailController

MDubos
